channel.title: hexo on Teach Me To Code
channel.description: Recent content in hexo on Teach Me To Code

item.title: Hello, World!
item.description: Most programming blogs feature posts from veteran programmers teaching others new concepts and techniques. However, I am a beginning programmer and I plan to blog about the things I’m learning and the difficulties I’m having. Hopefully I can help other beginning programmers, but more importantly I hope people will get involved and teach me to code! Why I Chose To Use Hexo Over the years, I’ve experimented with many different ways to manage a blog.
